```{r setup}
library(testthat)
library(jeksterslabRutils)
context("Test util_clean_dir.")
```


## Parameters

### Initialize temporary folders in the working directory


```{r temp}
tmp_01 <- util_make_subdir()
tmp_02 <- util_make_subdir()
```


## Expect error


```{r testthat_01}
test_that("error", {
  expect_error(
    util_clean_dir(
      dir = "NONEXISTENT",
      create_dir = FALSE
    )
  )
})
```


### Clean up temporary files and folders


```{r cleanup}
util_clean_dir(
  dir = tmp_01,
  create_dir = FALSE
)
util_clean_dir(
  dir = tmp_02,
  create_dir = FALSE
)
```
